My name is Dave and this is my portfolio.

I am a senior at Cornell University, studying Chemical Engineering and Data Science.

As a results-driven data scientist, I am passionate about uncovering patterns and hidden insights in data. I thrive on extracting actionable information and building predictive models that drive strategic decision-making. Collaborating in multidisciplinary teams fuels my motivation, as it allows me to contribute my expertise, learn from others, and tackle complex challenges. With this combination of passion, analytical skills, and a collaborative mindset, I strive to make a meaningful impact in the field of data science, leveraging data to drive informed decision-making and solve real-world problems.
